alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 4:02AM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 3 to 7 inches for the Cascade foothills and 6 to 12 inches for the Cascades. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels rise to about 1500 feet Thursday afternoon, then gradually lower Thursday night.
info.instruction: Prepare for winter driving conditions. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
